decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (952/01 Revision B, dated 12/02/2014; 952/02 Revision B, dated 12/02/2014; 952/08 Revision B, dated 12/02/2014; 952/09, dated 12/02/2014; Design and Access Statement, dated 19/02/2014; received 08/05/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 354 Jersey Road.
Condition : 5 - The proposed development shall not be implemented in conjunction with the outbuilding referred to under planning decision 00647/354/P6 dated 23rd April 2014.
description: Erection of single storey detached outbuilding to rear including gym and music studio for use by occupants of the existing house
